overview: The first part of the show "The Nakba" - which was broadcast on Friday 09/5/2014 - clarified that the Palestinian Nakba did not begin and end in 1948, but rather revealed that the beginning was in 1799 when Napoleon Bonaparte besieged the walls of Akka, and called on the "Jews" of the world to come to Palestine.
title: النكبة، الجزء الأول؛ خيوط المؤامرة
